= perf =
== event ==
	1. probe
		a) perf probe --add do_nanosleep
		b) perf record -e probe:do_nanosleep -a sleep 5
		c) perf script
		d) perf probe --del do_nanosleep
		
== 火焰图 ==
		a) perf record -F 99 -a -g -p 17518 -- sleep 5
		b) perf script > stacks1
		c) ./FlameGraph/stackcollapse-perf.pl perf.unfold &> perf.folded
		d) ./FlameGraph/flamegraph.pl perf.folded > perf.svg
